CurrencyWeight.Name: Track Currency Weight

AuditLogEnabled.Name: Enable Audit Log

FirstLevelFullHp.Hint: When enabled, the first level of the first class added to a character automatically grants maximum hit points from the class's hit die (e.g., d8 = 8 HP). The value remains editable in the level history.
